meanings: counter for carriages (e.g., in a train)

sdata.e: How difficult a thing it is, to love, and to be wise, and both at once.

sdata.e: And at times when I became discouraged with trying to reconcile working and bringing up children, it was my husband who helped to maintain my determination.

sdata.e: Especially over the last 20 years, the purported link between progressive welfare policies and economic failure in the Northern European countries seems to point to the difficulty of sustaining both full social welfare and international competitivity.
